Text:
There is a little of a jump between 31 and 32 minutes into this episode, something was cut from it. Quite bizarre, actually. And I feel like there were others, smaller cuts, but nothing problematic like this one.
Other than that, perfect audio and video quality, like always. Just this problem that upset me.
Thanks for the good work overall!

It seems like the problematic jump was mine when I jumped to conclusions. There was a random scene out of place, which was strange, and I deduced a bit was missing. But nothing is missing, nothing is out of place if you disregard this brief scene and my previous comment.
Nice episode, nice quality, nice speed.
